'''Joyous Letters''' is a [[Gadget]] obtained during the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event by collecting 200 [[Excerpts of Bliss]]. Upon activation, the Jocund Letters will reveal all Excerpts of Bliss in [[Simulanka]] including [[Jubilant Feather]]s, [[Fairytale Trove]]s, and [[Hero's Journey]]. The gadget has a 60-second cooldown between uses.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Joyous Letters replaces [[Jocund Letters]] upon redeeming the 200 Excerpts of Bliss.<!--
* The message "All Excerpts of Bliss have been marked" will appear if the Joyous Letters is activated when all Excerpts of Bliss in the area have been obtained. The {{Tx}} cooldown will also still persist when the gadget is activated.
-->
